设置参数`href`添加链接跳转功能。.en-us: Set the parameter `href` to add the link jump function.

通过参数`icon`，可基于图标代号直接使用**AntdIcon**中的各种图标.en-us: With the parameter `icon`, you can use the various icons in **AntdIcon** directly as the prefix icon of the node.

节点添加悬浮菜单.en-us: Add floating menu to the node

在面包屑的节点添加悬浮菜单。.en-us: Add floating menus to the nodes in the breadcrumb.

通过`clickedItem`进行面包屑节点点击事件的监听。.en-us: Listen to the click event of the breadcrumb node through `clickedItem`.
